vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Num.26.38;
son of: Benjamin (H1144);
brother of: Bela (H1106A), Becher (H1071), Ashbel (H0788), Gera (H1617), Naaman (H5283), Ehi (H0278), Rosh (H7220), Muppim (H4649), Huppim (H2650H), Ard (H0714) and Jediael (H3043)
Also named: a.chi.ra.mi (אֲחִירָמִי "Ahiramite" H0298)
§ Ahiram = "my brother is exalted" or "brother or (the) lofty"
a Benjamite, son of Benjamin
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞希蘭 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "我兄弟被高舉" 或 "兄弟或崇高的人"
便雅憫人, 便雅憫的兒子 (民 26:38)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚希兰 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "我兄弟被高举" 或 "兄弟或崇高的人"
便雅悯人, 便雅悯的儿子 (民 26:38)
